mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberAge, memberMobile) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberMobile})
mapper.select: -- 이메일과 비밀번호가 둘다 일치하는 확인 select * from member_table where memberEmail = #{memberEmail} and memberPassword = #{memberPassword}
